title: Audrey Hepburn
summary: Audrey Hepburn (born Audrey Kathleen Ruston; 4 May 1929 â€“ 20 January 1993) was a British[lower-alpha 1] actress and humanitarian. Recognised as both a film and fashion icon, she was ranked by the American Film Institute as the third-greatest female screen legend from the Classical Hollywood cinema and was inducted into the International Best Dressed List Hall of Fame.
